title: INSANE unnecessary sion buffs on PBE

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I know this is still on the pbe but for god sake PLEASE don't go through with these sion buffs. Im a challenger sion one trick with almost 1million points on him and these buffs are WAY too overboard. This buff can get sion to be a pick or ban champ. For the love of god rito please reconsider this crazy buff he is completely fine in the spot he is in right now. Please leave him alone I beg you :(

replies.body: I like the change to his w but holy shit what are they doing with his ultimate.
I think the w change is alright but combined with the ult buff is just fucking stupid ahah.
